pageContext.claim: “Actually a very, very prominent person who you know well, who's on your show a lot, said the person at the European Union that's in charge of taxation hates the United States more than any person anywhere in the world. And I really believe that's true. Every week you see them going after Facebook and Apple and all of these companies, that are, you know, great companies but something is going on. But I will say the European Union is suing them all the time.”
pageContext.analysis: There's no evidence for this claim that EU tax officials have it out for the United States. Europe has strict privacy laws that U.S. companies such as Facebook have been found to violate.
